name: PerformActionOnMachineGroup
helpMarkDown: Perform given action on machine group
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Subscription to target for performing action.

inputs.name: MachineGroupName
inputs.label: Machine Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Machine Group on which the operation is to be performed.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Actions to be performed on the machines or machine group

inputs.name: Filters
inputs.label: Apply to Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default action is performed on all machines, to apply the action on a subset use tags or machine names like Role: Web, Role: Test, BudgetIT01 . Applicable only to Start, Delete, Stop, Restart actions

inputs.name: BlockedFor
inputs.label: Block For
inputs.helpMarkDown: Can block a machine group either for a this instance or for entire definition i.e. for all instances of the definition

inputs.name: TimeInHours
inputs.label: Time in Hours
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies number of hours for which machine group is to be blocked. Default value is 0 which blocks machine indefinitely
